short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Enable the fun on every website

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Have fun browsing all your favorite sites!

- Websites now change hues over time to fully represent each colour.
- Images now rotate so you can see each angle of them in all their glory.
- Text now changes casing on each visit so we can appreciate each letter for what its worth!
- Comic Sans MS doesn't get enough appreciation, so all fonts now default to it!
- The web uses a lot of rounded borders, so to make up for our lack of appreciation for hard edged borders, we've turned off rounded borders

We hope all these changes allow everyone to fully appreciate the works of art that exist on the internet.
